summary: This document is an email chain between FBI agents discussing efforts to locate Ghislaine Maxwell in August 2019. The New York FBI agent requests an update on her potential location in Manchester-by-the-Sea, and a Boston FBI agent reports having been tasked to follow up on a tip from local police and coordinate assistance.

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: FBI SSA from Squad C-20 (Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking) in New York, leading efforts to locate Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual whose location the FBI is attempting to nail down, with a tip placing her potentially in Manchester-by-the-Sea.

connections.description: Sean, an FBI SSA, is actively working to locate and investigate Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Boston FBI receives tip on Maxwell's location
events.description: The Boston FBI was updated by A/ASAC and SSA about information received from Manchester-by-the-Sea regarding Maxwell's potential presence there.

events.title: NY FBI follows up on Maxwell's location
events.description: Sean from the NY FBI emails the Boston FBI to nail down Maxwell's location and check if she is still in the Manchester-by-the-Sea area.

keyFacts: In August 2019, the FBI was actively attempting to locate Ghislaine Maxwell, with a specific tip placing her in Manchester-by-the-Sea.
The investigation involved coordination between the FBI's New York field office (Squad C-20, Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking) and the Boston field office.
The email indicates the FBI was seeking to confirm Maxwell's presence and determine appropriate follow-on actions, which could include arrest.
